sourcesContent:
// ** React Imports import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' // ** Reactstrap Imports import { Row, Col, Card, Label, Input, Modal, Button, CardBody, CardTitle, ModalBody, CardHeader, ModalHeader, FormFeedback } from 'reactstrap' // ** Third Party Components import Select from 'react-select' import { Home, Check, X, Briefcase } from 'react-feather' import { useForm, Controller } from 'react-hook-form' // ** Utils import { selectThemeColors } from '@utils' // ** Styles import '@styles/react/libs/react-select/_react-select.scss' const countryOptions = [ { value: 'uk', label: 'UK' }, { value: 'usa', label: 'USA' }, { value: 'france', label: 'France' }, { value: 'russia', label: 'Russia' }, { value: 'canada', label: 'Canada' } ] const defaultValues = { lastName: '', firstName: '' } const BillingAddress = () => { // ** States const [show, setShow] = useState(false) // ** Hooks const { reset, control, setError, clearErrors, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm({ defaultValues }) const onSubmit = data => { if (Object.values(data).every(field => field.length > 0)) { setShow(false) reset() } else { setError('firstName', { type: 'manual' }) setError('lastName', { type: 'manual' }) } } const onDiscard = () => { clearErrors() setShow(false) reset() } return ( Billing Address Company Name: PIXINVENT Billing Email: themeselection@ex.com Tax ID: TAX-357378 VAT Number: SDF754K77 Billing Address: 100 Water Plant Avenue, Building 1303 Wake Island Contact: +1 (605) 977-32-65 Country: Wake Island State: Capholim Zipcode: 403114 setShow(!show)} className='modal-dialog-centered modal-lg' > setShow(!show)}>

Add New Address

Add address for billing address

( )} /> {errors.firstName && Please enter a valid First Name} ( )} /> {errors.lastName && Please enter a valid Last Name}
) } export default BillingAddress
